title: Spiced Treacle Cookies
ingredients: ['440g plain flour', '1 tablespoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '75g margarine', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '350g black treacle', '4 tablespoons buttermilk', '120g chopped walnuts', '290g raisins', '120g cut mixed peel']
